'''Puffed Grainfruit Bars''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The recipe can be obtained by talking to [[Camotli]] at [["Collective of Plenty"]].

Depending on the quality, Grainfruit Meat Soup restores '''20'''/'''22'''/'''24'''% of Max HP and an additional '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target character. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].

Players can also produce Puffed Grainfruit Bars by operating [[Atolli]]'s machine at the [["Collective of Plenty"|Collective of Plenty]].
